name: Tesla Arena
description:
Game made in 1 week for the Lost Relic Jam With the theme : Connection

Fight for your life in the Tesla Arena ! 

Release powerfull electric arcs that will obliterate anything standing between you and the tesla towers & fry the endless wave of evil batteries trying to shatter you to pieces.

Fight your way through the different arenas to earn the right to challenge the arcade arena & get the chance to brag about your hight score.

ControlsKeyboard
  • Move : Arrow keys
  • Attack : X
  • Pause : P / Escape
Controller

(Not available on WebGL. Please use download version)

  • Move : L-Stick / D-Pad
  • Attack : X (Xbox) / ▢  (PS)
  • Pause : Start
